description: This file defines a simple in-memory search index for videos, allowing keyword-based search over a static dataset. It includes the 'VideoSearchIndex' object with a 'search' method that filters videos based on query relevance, considering title, category, and description.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search over the videos dataset based on the provided query string; returns a list of matching Video objects, ordered by relevance score.
